textBeforeTable: Healing Skills Nature Healing Charge +1 point. After casting it can resotre XXX-XXX HP of a single friendly target instantaneously. Mystic Skills Skills Mystic Armor Equipment Relics Staves Two Handed Hammer One Handed Hammer Weapons High cost to gear: As mystic can equip a large amount of items and should change them based on the situation, mystics can be very expensive to gear effectively compared to other classes Stun and Rooting: Although the Mystic is very powerful at close range, they are almost helpless when it comes to being stunned and/or rooted. The only way to prevent stun is using an Anti-Stun staff which will lower our capabilities in battle. High MP Cost: The cost of Skills raise as you upgrade your skills. Disadvantages of a Mystic: Healing: The Mystic is able to resurrect other players, heal and restore MP.
